name: Taupe Crochet Slippers for Women
description:
These taupe, comfy made-to-order crocheted women's slippers are made from a soft, 50% cotton, 50% acrylic blend yarn. They are made with double soles for added coziness. Perfect for those days you want to just wrap up in a fluffy duvet, drink hot tea and read in a window seat. I love to keep a pair by the front door so I can slip my shoes off as soon as I get home. They're a perfect treat for yourself, your best girl friend, your mothers, sisters, aunts, grandmothers, wives, and daughters!

Notes and Tips:
- US women's sizes 5-10 are currently available. If you are a half size, we recommend ordering the size below the half - i.e. if you are a size 6.5, we recommend ordering a size 6.

- To care for your slippers, simply wash in the washing machine in lukewarm water and dry in the dryer. As with most crochet slippers that contain cotton, after they've been worn a few times, they may feel like they have stretched a bit. They'll return to their size after being washed and dried. =)

All slippers are made to order, so please expect an order processing time of 5-7 business days prior to shipping. Shipping is free to the continental U.S and $5.00 to Canada, Australia, and the UK. Message me for a shipping quote to anywhere else. Thanks!
